FuncDef: The display e-trunk state-change member-interface command displays the last 10 state changes of an E-Trunk member interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Specifies the ID of an E-Trunk.
The Eth-Trunk ID is an integer ranging from 1 to 128.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After E-Trunk is configured, you can run the display e-trunk state-change command to check the state changes of an E-Trunk member interface.
Prerequisites
An Eth-Trunk interface working in Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) mode or manual load balancing mode has been added to the E-Trunk.
